Sarasvati-0.0.1: A graph-based workflow engine for HaskellContentsIndex
Workflow.Sarasvati.Loader
Synopsis
data XmlWorkflow = XmlWorkflow {
xmlWfName :: String
xmlWfNodes :: [XmlNode]
}
data XmlNode = XmlNode {
xmlNodeName :: String
xmlNodeType :: String
xmlNodeIsJoin :: Bool
xmlNodeIsStart :: Bool
xmlNodeGuard :: String
xmlArcs :: [XmlArc]
xmlExternalArcs :: [XmlExternalArc]
xmlNodeExtra :: NodeExtra
}
data XmlArc = XmlArc {
xmlArcName :: String
xmlArcTo :: String
}
data XmlExternalArcType
= InArc
| OutArc
data XmlExternalArc = XmlExternalArc {
xmlExtArcName :: String
xmlExtArcExternal :: String
xmlExtArcInstance :: String
xmlExtArcNodeName :: String
xmlExtArcType :: XmlExternalArcType
}
loadXmlWorkflowFromFile :: String -> Map String (Element -> NodeExtra) -> IO (Either String XmlWorkflow)
loadWfGraphFromFile :: Loader l => l -> String -> Map String (Element -> NodeExtra) -> IO (Either String WfGraph)
loadXmlWorkflow :: Document -> Map String (Element -> NodeExtra) -> IO (Either String XmlWorkflow)
loadXmlNodes :: [Element] -> Map String (Element -> NodeExtra) -> [XmlNode]
loadXmlArcs :: [Element] -> [XmlArc]
loadXmlExternalArcs :: [Element] -> [XmlExternalArc]
data LoadNode = LoadNode {
loadedNode :: Node
xmlNode :: XmlNode
}
class Loader loader where
createWorkflow :: loader -> XmlWorkflow -> IO Int
createNode :: loader -> Int -> XmlNode -> IO Node
createArc :: loader -> Int -> String -> Node -> Node -> IO Arc
importInstance :: loader -> Int -> String -> String -> IO ([Node], [Arc])
class Resolver resolver where
resolveGraphNameToXmlWorkflow :: resolver -> String -> IO XmlWorkflow
processXmlWorkflow :: Loader l => l -> XmlWorkflow -> IO WfGraph
extractNodes :: [LoadNode] -> Map String ([Node], [Arc]) -> [Node]
extractArcs :: [Arc] -> [Arc] -> Map String ([Node], [Arc]) -> [Arc]
instanceKey :: XmlExternalArc -> String
importExternal :: Loader l => l -> Int -> Map String ([Node], [Arc]) -> XmlExternalArc -> IO (Map String ([Node], [Arc]))
xmlNodeToLoadNode :: Loader l => l -> Int -> XmlNode -> IO LoadNode
createInternalArcs :: Loader l => l -> Int -> [LoadNode] -> IO [Arc]
createInternalArc :: Loader l => l -> LoadNode -> Int -> [LoadNode] -> XmlArc -> IO Arc
createExternalArcs :: Loader l => l -> Int -> [LoadNode] -> Map String ([Node], [Arc]) -> IO [Arc]
createExternalArc :: Loader l => l -> Int -> Map String ([Node], [Arc]) -> (Node, XmlExternalArc) -> IO Arc
xmlNodeToNode :: Int -> XmlNode -> Node
data SimpleFileResolver = SimpleFileResolver {
basePath :: String
funcMap :: (Map String (Element -> NodeExtra))
}

data XmlNode
An XmlNode stores the data from a node element.

data XmlArc
An XmlArc stores the data from an arc element.
Constructors
XmlArc
xmlArcName :: String
xmlArcTo :: String
Instances
Show XmlArc
data XmlExternalArcType
Enumerates the kind of external arcs allowed, which are just outgoing arcs and incoming arcs. Internal arcs are all defined as outgoing, but because external arcs must add arcs to nodes not in the same workflow, they are allowed both.
Constructors
InArc
OutArc
Instances
Show XmlExternalArcType
data XmlExternalArc
Contains all the information we need to load an external referenced workflow and import it into the currently loading workflow.
Constructors
XmlExternalArc
xmlExtArcName :: String
xmlExtArcExternal :: String
xmlExtArcInstance :: String
xmlExtArcNodeName :: String
xmlExtArcType :: XmlExternalArcType
Instances
Show XmlExternalArc
